name: NitroBoostLinker
title: Nitro Boost Linker
author: Gabriel
description: Grants the NitroBoost permission when a linked Discord user is actively boosting the guild (premium_since) or has a Booster role. Hard-fails unless Image Library + Rust Kits + Custom Auto Kits are installed and Discord is configured.

permissions.name: NitroBoost
permissions.description: Granted automatically to players who qualify via Nitro boost or Booster role. Use this permission in Custom Auto Kits to unlock VIP kits.

commands.description: Start Discord link flow (or show help). Available to all players.
Complete Discord link verification using the code DM'd by the bot.
Show the player's current link/boost status.
Admin only. Re-check boost/role status for one player or all linked players.
Admin/console/RCON. Configure Discord bot credentials at runtime without editing files.
Admin/console/RCON. Print dependency/config health and write to oxide/logs/NitroBoostLinker.txt.

security.notes: Uses Discord Bot token for REST calls (guild/member lookup and DMs). No webhooks or inbound listeners. Bot token is stored in the Oxide config file. Restrict console and RCON access to prevent token exposure when using /nitrodiscordbotlink.
